summary: Thermal Tickets (Tickets Térmicos) feature fully tested and working. All backend API endpoints pass (11/11 tests). Frontend UI works correctly - form displays events/categories, generates tickets with QR codes, shows preview modal, and has download/print functionality.
passed_tests: POST /api/admin/generar-entradas-termicas generates batch of 5 tickets correctly
Generated tickets contain QR code, payload, and hash validation
Thermal ticket validation by code works
Form shows events dropdown with FESTIVAL DEL HUMOR
Form shows categories dropdown with Gradas - $2.50
Generated tickets display with unique codes
Ver button opens preview modal with ticket image
Preview shows QR code, event name, category, price
Tickets Térmicos link present in sidebar on Dashboard
Tickets Térmicos link present in sidebar on Eventos
Tickets Térmicos link present in sidebar on Compras
updated_files: /app/tests/test_thermal_tickets.py - Created comprehensive test suite for thermal tickets
seed_data_creation: Generated test thermal tickets during testing (automatically approved for taquilla sales)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Thermal Tickets feature is fully functional. The AdminTicketsTermicos.jsx page allows generating tickets for thermal 80mm printers. Tickets are generated with unique alphanumeric codes (CF-{CAT}-{UNIQUE}), QR codes, and are automatically approved for taquilla sales. The GET /api/admin/entrada-termica/{id} endpoint returns PNG images at 576x400px resolution suitable for thermal printers. The sidebar menu has the 'Tickets Térmicos' link on all admin pages.
